author: werken
msg: Mostly hackings to make all sorts of Ant tasks, datatypes, dynamically
loaded taskdefs, wrapped javabean taskdefs, and other Ant muckage work
Other superficial no-op changes while debugging.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the JSL library so that <stylesheet> can now output a Stylesheet variable that can be repeatedly used by the <style> tag.
Used this new capability in the jelly script to generate the tag documentation, src/script/makeTagDoc.jelly.
The script is close to being useful but needs a bit more hacking yet.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a commons-logging tag library so that logging to either log4j, logkit or JDK1.4
can easily be done from inside Jelly scripts, irrespective of the XML event pipeline.
So for example debugging logging can be done in the middle of an XML transformation, without affecting the output result.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added first cut of generation of tag library documentation using the XMLDoclet.
Still some way to go to get nice output but at least this is a start.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for <element> <attribute> <copyOf> and <copy> tags. The <copy> tag is not quite finished yet but the others should be.
Need to write some JUnit test cases for these new tags.
